summary: Two bumblers, failures as businessmen and air raid wardens, stumble across a nest of Nazi saboteurs bent on blowing up the local magnesium plant.
cast: Stan Laurel|Oliver Hardy|Edgar Kennedy|Jacqueline White|Stephen McNally|Nella Walker|Donald Meek|Henry O'Neill|Howard Freeman|Paul Stanton|Robert Emmett O'Connor|William Tannen|Russell Hicks|Philip Van Zandt|Frederick Worlock|Don Costello|Sam Ash|King Baggot|Brooks Benedict|Chet Brandenburg|Bobby Burns|Martin Cichy|Charles Coleman|Jules Cowles|Daisy|Bess Flowers|Dick Gordon|Paul Gustine|Mahlon Hamilton|Edward Hearn|Betty Jaynes|Frank McLure|Howard M. Mitchell|Bert Moorhouse|William H. O'Brien|Lee Phelps|Constance Purdy|Charles Regan|Jack Richardson|Hal Taggart|Forrest Taylor|Larry Wheat|Joe Yule
keywords: nazi spy|nazi agent|air raid warden|horse|clydesdale horse
title: Air Raid Wardens
